content.query:
DROP TABLE wwi.PostalCodes
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'PostalCodes' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE wwi.PostalCodes
	(
	 City nvarchar(30),
	 [State] nvarchar(30),
	 Zip nvarchar(10),
	 Latitude nvarchar(10),
	 Longitude nvarchar(10),
	 Timezone nvarchar(2)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_PostalCodes
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO wwi.PostalCodes
(City 1, [State] 2, Zip 3, Latitude 4, Longitude 5, Timezone 6)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/postalcodes.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.PostalCodes
GO
